abstract: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) has become essential in clinical diagnosis due to its high resolution and multiple contrast mechanisms. However, the relatively long acquisition time limits its broader application. To address this issue, this study …

title: Ensemble of Deep Learning Architectures with Machine Learning for Pneumonia Classification Using Chest X-rays
details: R Vyas, DR Khadatkar - Journal of Imaging Informatics in Medicine, 2024
abstract: Pneumonia is a severe health concern, particularly for vulnerable groups, needing early and correct classification for optimal treatment. This study addresses the use of deep learning combined with machine learning classifiers (DLxMLCs) for pneumonia …

title: RadGraph-XL: A Large-Scale Expert-Annotated Dataset for Entity and Relation Extraction from Radiology Reports
details: JB Delbrouck, P Chambon, Z Chen, M Varma… - Findings of the Association …, 2024
abstract: In order to enable extraction of structured clinical data from unstructured radiology reports, we introduce RadGraph-XL, a large-scale, expert-annotated dataset for clinical entity and relation extraction. RadGraph-XL consists of 2,300 radiology …
